unauthorized: You do not have access to this page.

payment_request_cancelled: Payment confirmation request has been cancelled.
invoice_generated: {count, plural, one {{count} invoice generated} other {{count} invoices generated}}.

storno_already_invoiced: Order cannot be cancelled — it is already invoiced.

forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action.
login_state_mismatch: Security error during login. Please try again.
login_not_registered: Your Microsoft account is not registered in this app. Contact your administrator.
